title: ACTREC Recruitment 2025 - Walk-in-Interview Statistician Post
description: The Advanced Centre for Treatment Research and Education in Cancer (ACTREC) has declared the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Statistician Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the B.Sc, M.Sc can grab this chance and apply for the ACTREC Recruitment 2025 . Here, we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible candidates can attend the interview at the...
